The report mentions that the tumor is a well-defined mass, 1.5 cm in diameter, with a safety margin of 3.5 cm. The report does not mention any evidence of vascular invasion, such as portal vein invasion, microvessel invasion, or serosal invasion. Additionally, there is no mention of intrahepatic metastasis or multicentric occurrence.
